ygData.subject: Re: question - articles concerning NEAT/HyperNEAT and activation function evolution
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Marcin, I don t know about actual publications on this topic but it has come up before, here in the group and elsewhere. I specifically remember Dr. Stanley
